TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit LayoutEngine extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來實作配置引擎的基底型別 (Base Class)。

span.span: Provides the base class for implementing layout engines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，在您想要在執行階段建立自訂的版面配置行為。Use the class when you want to create custom layout behavior at run time. 衍生您自己的類別，從類別並覆寫方法來定義自訂版面配置行為。Derive your own class from the class and override the method to define your custom layout behavior. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別來實作自訂的版面配置行為。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to implement custom layout behavior. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/cpp/DemoFlowLayout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/CS/DemoFlowLayout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/VB/DemoFlowLayout.vb#1)]

related.span: 如何：實作自訂配置引擎

span.span: How to: Implement a Custom Layout Engine

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

para.span: 版面配置行為應該是相同的版面配置引擎的相關聯的容器任何的類別執行個體。

span.span: Layout behavior should be the same for any instance of your layout engine's associated container class.

para.span: 基於這個理由，請考慮您的版面配置引擎的建構函式宣告或，和實作您的版面配置引擎，作為單一類別。

span.span: For this reason, consider declaring your layout engine's constructor or , and implementing your layout engine as a singleton class.

Initializes the layout engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選擇性地提供中的初始化邏輯方法。Optionally provide initialization logic in the method.

exception.span: 不是 可以在上面執行配置的型別。

span.span: is not a type on which can perform layout.

para.span: 覆寫方法，以提供您的自訂初始設定行為。

span.span: Override the method to provide your custom initialization behavior.

related.span: 如何：實作自訂配置引擎

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Layout (object container, System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs layoutEventArgs);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Layout(object container, class System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs layoutEventArgs) cil managed
public: virtual bool Layout(System::Object ^ container, System::Windows::Forms::LayoutEventArgs ^ layoutEventArgs);
abstract member Layout : obj * System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs -> bool override this.Layout : obj * System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs -> bool

param.name: container
param.span: 配置引擎將在其中作業的容器。

span.span: The container on which the layout engine will operate.
An event argument from a event.

summary.span: 要求配置引擎執行一個配置作業。

span.span: Requests that the layout engine perform a layout operation.

returns.span: 如果 的父代 (Parent) 應該再次執行配置，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if layout should be performed again by the parent of ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版面配置引擎上執行配置作業時，會呼叫這個方法`container`參數。This method is called when the layout engine is to perform a layout operation on the `container` parameter. 您可以檢查的值， ，並上的屬性`layoutEventArgs`決定如果有必要的配置作業。You can check the value of the , , and properties on `layoutEventArgs` to decide if a layout operation is necessary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法，以實作自訂的版面配置行為。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to implement custom layout behavior. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/cpp/DemoFlowLayout.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/CS/DemoFlowLayout.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/VB/DemoFlowLayout.vb#4)]

exception.span: 不是 可以在上面執行配置的型別。

span.span: is not a type on which can perform layout.

para.span: 覆寫方法，以提供自訂的版面配置行為。

span.span: Override the method to provide your custom layout behavior.

para.span: 當配置的內容參數，請務必檢查每個子控制項的屬性。

span.span: When laying out the contents of the parameter, be sure to check the property of each child control.

para.span: 傳回如果您的版面配置引擎的邏輯會決定應該再次執行該版面配置，由容器的父系。

span.span: Return if your layout engine logic determines that layout should be performed again by the parent of the container.

para.span: 這可能是，比方說，當版面配置引擎調整子控制項的大小，並判斷容器，必須以容納新的版面配置的大小增加時。

span.span: This might occur, for example, when the layout engine resizes child controls and determines that the container must be increased in size to accommodate the new layout.

related.span: 如何：實作自訂配置引擎

span.span: How to: Implement a Custom Layout Engine
